name: Squareathon
description:
Squareathon! Jump and Run your way through this Endless Action-Packed Platformer. Unlock Doors , Open Bridges avoid Spikes to keep your feet on to the game. Play with your friends and beat each other's High Scores!

Please tell me regarding the bugs you have discovered :)

=============================================================

Developed by Marty

PLAY AND SHARE IT WITH YOUR FRIENDS!

This is my very first time sharing my game to other people, sorry if you are not satisfied with my game but please give it a try and Ill improve everyday and please Tell me if you have suggestions :)
